content: the back loop ws wrong side heel heel increases are worked in the solid-color section of chart a/b 16 sts are added in each repeat of the chart after starting the increases you will work chart a/b depending on your size 1 5/2/2 times the increases are spread out over the entire circumference of the sock so they are almost invisible rather than forming a sharp edge to the heel continue colorwork chart on row 4 6 8 and 10 increase 4 stitches evenly throughout the round and put the increases in different places each increase round after this first set of increases you will have 80/88/96 sts continue increasing in this fashion until you have added 24/32/32 sts and you have finished chart a/b you now have 88/104/112 sts cut cc and knit stockinette in mc until the foot measures the desired finished length before beginning the heel turn rearrange sts as follows move the first 6/8/8 sts and the last 6/8/8 sts from the instep needle onto the sole needle you now have 32/36/40 sts on the instep and 56/68/72 sts on the sole on the instep knit all stitches on the sole start the heel turn working back and forth as follows round 1 rs k31/36/39 k2tog k1 turn round 2 ws sl1 p7/5/7 p2tog tbl p1 turn row 3 rs sl1 knit to the last st before the gap k2tog k1 turn row 4 ws sl1 purl to the last st before the gap p2tog tbl p1 turn repeat row 3 and 4 until there are 2/1/2 unworked sts on each side of the heel turn ending with round 4 to finish the heel sl1 k28/34/36 k2tog k1/0/1 don t turn at this point but resume working in the round on the instep knit all stitches on the sole k1/0/1 work ssk and knit remaining sts you now have 32/36/40 sts on both the front and the back of the leg your heel is finished 4 waiting for mistletoe clue 3 leg knit stockinette in mc until the leg measures about 10 cm 4 inches less than desired finished length attach cc and start colorwork following chart a for the first sock and chart b for the second repeat sts 1 4 a total of 16/18/20 times in the round work row 1 14 once cut cc and knit 3 rounds in mc start the cuff following chart c repeat sts 1 8 a total of 8/9/10 times in the round work row 1 3 a total of 10 times or
